name: Mock SAML
description: Mock SAML is a free SAML 2.0 Identity Provider for testing SAML SSO integrations.

APP_URL.description: Public root URL of the Mock SAML installation. Replace <HEROKU_APP_NAME> with 'App name' from above.

PUBLIC_KEY.description: Base64 encoded value of public key.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Base64 encoded value of private key.
